org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter

Class Collider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter.Collider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Character, Item

    public class Collider
extends java.lang.Object
    Collider-class is anything that interacts with gravity and doesn't go through map obstacles. Most of objects will be destroyable, so they will automaticly implement health points and taking damage
    Author:
    Pasi Toivanen

      • groundCollision

        public boolean groundCollision(Map m)
        Will tell if the collider's feet are overlapping to the existing map
        Parameters:
        m - Map object that is called through the update-method
        Returns:
        true, if there is anything to collide with

      • update

        public void update(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> o,
                   Map m,
                   int delta)
        updates collider so that it will obey the mechanics with map and other objects in the gameState
        Parameters:
        o - Other objects in the gameState
        m - Map object of the gameState
        delta - Number of updates to do in single run

      • modifyGravitation

        public void modifyGravitation(org.newdawn.slick.geom.Vector2f g)
        For debugging mostly. Doesn't really work because the physics engine doesn't support any other gravity than the ones which are pointing down
        Parameters:
        g -
